title: Busy Days
author: JGray
text:
So far this week I've helped build a room, a sandbox, and a cabinet set. I am a tired author.

As for Theresa... she's certainly coming up with unconventional ways to engage in hand to hand combat, isn't she?

replies.author: Nessa*Guest*
replies.text: So "snork" is what that sound... sounds like? :-)

replies.author: Pashakitty*Guest*
replies.text: Okay, now that's just disgusting as all get out.

replies.author: Azure*Guest*
replies.text: So it's not kissing that's the weakness, it's being silenced by having an object with mucus shoved in the mouth? That's DISGUSTING!

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Hmmm perhaps they have a violent reaction to the bacteria naturally inherent in the human body. [Spock]Fascinating. [/spock]

replies.author: Peyote Short*Guest*
replies.text: Kind of the same way you defeat a Martian.

replies.author: Azure*Guest*
replies.text: Then again, perhaps they just have to KEEP TALKING while they fight, and if they are forcefully silenced even for a moment... Wicked Witch of the West time!
